chapter.title: Host Runtime
chapter.para: See the original BEEN project documentation for a detailed description of the Host Runtime .

sect1.title: Summary of Changes
sect1.para:
Here is a list of changes made to Host Runtime component:
Two new task lauchers have been added to allow Host Runtime to run tasks implemented in Python and platform-dependent Shell. Also, to allow packaging of script tasks, the config.xml task configuration file's schema was enriched by two elements. More about this can be found in .
Support code to free resources (disk space and memory) after tasks' context gets deleted have been added. Task Manager and Host Runtime now cooperate in a way, that all resources associated with a task are made free after context containing this task is deleted (will happen shortly after the context gets closed by Benchmark Manager).
